translations.chinese: 十二月，上還過趙，不禮趙王。
translations.english: In the twelfth month, the emperor returned passing through Zhao and did not show courtesy to King Zhao.

translations.chinese: 是月，匈奴攻代，代王喜棄國，自歸雒陽，赦為合陽侯。
translations.english: This month, the Xiongnu attacked Dai. King Dai Xi abandoned the kingdom and personally returned to Luoyang. He was pardoned and made Marquis of Heyang.
On the day xinsi, he established son Ruyi as King of Dai.

translations.chinese: 春，令郎中有罪耐以上，請之。
translations.english: In spring, he commanded that palace gentlemen with punishments of tattooing or above could redeem themselves.
People who gave birth to children were exempted from service for two years.
